inputSpec.name: nextflow_run_opts
inputSpec.label: Nextflow Run Options
inputSpec.help: Additional run arguments for Nextflow (e.g. -profile docker).

inputSpec.name: nextflow_pipeline_params
inputSpec.label: Nextflow Pipeline Parameters
inputSpec.help: Additional pipeline parameters for Nextflow. Must be preceded with double dash characters (e.g. --foo, which can be accessed in the pipeline script using the params.foo identifier).

inputSpec.name: docker_creds
inputSpec.label: Docker Credentials
inputSpec.help: Docker credentials used to obtain private docker images.

inputSpec.name: debug
inputSpec.label: Debug Mode
inputSpec.help: Shows additional information in the job log. If true, the execution log messages from Nextflow will also be included.

inputSpec.name: resume
inputSpec.label: Resume
inputSpec.help: Unique ID of the previous session to be resumed. If 'true' or 'last' is provided instead of the sessionID, will resume the latest resumable session run by an applet with the same name in the current project in the last 6 months.

inputSpec.name: preserve_cache
inputSpec.label: Preserve Cache
inputSpec.help: Enable storing pipeline cache and local working files to the current project. If true, local working files and cache files will be uploaded to the platform, so the current session could be resumed in the future

inputSpec.name: nextflow_soft_confs
inputSpec.label: Soft Configuration File
inputSpec.help: (Optional) One or more nextflow configuration files to be appended to the Nextflow pipeline configuration set

inputSpec.name: nextflow_params_file
inputSpec.label: Script Parameters File
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A file, in YAML or JSON format, for specifying input parameter values

outputSpec.name: published_files
outputSpec.label: Published files of Nextflow pipeline
outputSpec.help: Output files published by current Nextflow pipeline and uploaded to the job output destination.
